Package org.lwjgl.bullet

Class B3JointSensorState2

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.bullet.B3JointSensorState2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
    public class B3JointSensorState2
extends Struct
implements NativeResource

    Layout

    
 struct b3JointSensorState2 {
     double m_jointPosition[4];
     double m_jointVelocity[3];
     double m_jointReactionForceTorque[6];
     double m_jointMotorTorque;
     int m_qDofSize;
     int m_uDofSize;
 }

        public B3JointSensorState2​(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
